rows.label: tlk001801_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Worry not, friends! Tatezo will fix
Kiku without fail! No matter how much
work and money it take!

rows.label: tlk001801_04_msg0002
rows.name:
With Kiku like this, Tatezo never able
to face late Dadapon Senzo!

rows.label: tlk001801_04_msg0003
rows.name:
Kiku! Hang in there for while longer!
Tatezo will fix Kiku soon!

rows.label: tlk001801_04_msg0006
rows.name:
Dadapon borrowing house of Tora.
Hope that okay. Need use of facilities
for repairs of Kiku!

rows.label: tlk001801_04_msg0007
rows.name:
If is for Kiku, use house of Tora
as much as Dadapon want!

rows.label: tlk001801_04_msg0009
rows.name:
It probably take quite long while
before Kiku able to function again,
but Dadapon fix her without fail!

rows.label: tlk001801_04_msg0010
rows.name:
Work hard, Dadapon!
Tora know you can do it!

rows.label: tlk001801_04_msg0011
rows.name:
Tora work hard too, okay? Try not to
cause too much trouble for friends!
